name: Acara dengan Media Lokal
title: K-Content Expo - Business Networking
subtitle: Biz Matching
venue: Sheraton Grand Jakarta Gandaria City Hotel 3F Grand ballroom
information: 40 Korean companies introduce their excellent cultural Content to buyer from Indonesia and ASEAN countries Program : 1:1 Biz-Matching / Networking Reception Content Fields: Broadcasting, Game & VR, Animation & Character

name: Pameran `Lucky Bag` oleh Lee Jong Hyo
title: K-Content Expo
subtitle: The Full Collection of Korean Content
information: Korea Creative Content Agency (KOCCA) proudly presents qualified Korean broadcasting game, animation/character to Indonesia. You can enjoy various Korean content at once. There are also several special event such as content exhibition, K-drama/animation screening, meet and greet with artist, K-beauty makeup class and many more.

name: Pameran Folk Art Festival Rakyat Chungbuk  `새벽을 연다`
title: K-POP CONCERT
subtitle: A Fantastic Weekend with K-POP Concert
information: Get ready for one of the biggest event in Korea Festival 2018. Enjoy 2 hours non-stop K-POP Concert featuring LOVELYZ, LYN, K.A.R.D, SNUPER and special performance by KOCCA's ambassador, HIGHLIGHT on 6th October 2018. Mark your calendar and get your tickets now!
